typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SiteID as string,
		SiteName as string,
		ID as integer,
		SampleDefinitionID as integer,
		ParameterCode as string,
		Value as double,
		Target as double,
		LCL as double,
		UCL as double,
		LSL as double,
		USL as double,
		SampleDateTime as string,
		EnteredDateTime as string,
		DueDateTime as timestamp,
		Week as string,
		EnteredWeek as string,
		User as string,
		Comment as string,
		ParameterType as string,
		KPIType as string,
		ProcessArea as string,
		SpecStatus as string,
		ComplianceStatus as string,
		OrderID as integer,
		BatchID as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		AreaID as integer,
		SystemID as integer,
		ProductTypeID as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		Brand as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> srcrSampleResAlr

srcrSampleResAlr, srcrSampleResIBY, srcrSampleResPOL, srcrSamplResNEW, srcrSamplResPROS, srcrSamplResCHAM, srcSamplResROS union(byName: true)~> rSampleRes
rSampleRes sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SiteID as string,
		SiteName as string,
		ID as integer,
		SampleDefinitionID as integer,
		ParameterCode as string,
		Value as double,
		Target as double,
		LCL as double,
		UCL as double,
		LSL as double,
		USL as double,
		SampleDateTime as string,
		EnteredDateTime as string,
		DueDateTime as timestamp,
		Week as string,
		EnteredWeek as string,
		User as string,
		Comment as string,
		ParameterType as string,
		KPIType as string,
		ProcessArea as string,
		SpecStatus as string,
		ComplianceStatus as string,
		OrderID as integer,
		BatchID as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		AreaID as integer,
		SystemID as integer,
		ProductTypeID as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		Brand as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> rSampleResults
